Package fr.eseo.pfemolkky.models

Class Pin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eseo.pfemolkky.models.Pin
  • public class Pin
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that initialize one pin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Pin.Battery
      An enumeration of the different state of battery that a pin can have

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Pin.Battery battery
      The battery level between the 5 states in the enum Battery
      private boolean connected
      The value if the pin is connected
      private boolean fallen
      The value if the pin is fallen
      private int number
      The number displayed on the pin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pin()  
      Pin​(int pinNumber)
      Constructor which will initialize a pin taking only the pin number
      The pin is considered not connected
      The pin is set not fallen
      The battery is considered dead
      Pin​(int pinNumber, Pin.Battery battery)
      Constructor which will initialize a pin taking the pin number and its state of battery
      The pin is considered connected
      The pin is set not fallen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pin

        public Pin()

      • Pin

        public Pin​(int pinNumber)
        Constructor which will initialize a pin taking only the pin number
        The pin is considered not connected
        The pin is set not fallen
        The battery is considered dead
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - the number of the pin

      • Pin

        public Pin​(int pinNumber,
           Pin.Battery battery)
        Constructor which will initialize a pin taking the pin number and its state of battery
        The pin is considered connected
        The pin is set not fallen
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - the number of the pin
        battery - the battery of the pin according to the state of the battery

    • Method Detail

        public boolean isConnected()
        Return the state of connection of the pin
        Returns:
        true if the pin is connected, else false

        Parameters:

      • hasFallen

        public boolean hasFallen()
        Get if the Pin has fallen or not
        Returns:
